title: MMA Junkie Radio #2996: Nate Diaz, Bellator 231-232 recaps, UFC Singapore and more
text:
Monday’s edition of MMA Junkie Radio with hosts “Gorgeous” George and “Goze” is here!

On Episode 2,996 of the podcast, the guys look back at Bellator’s dual event weekend, the UFC’s Singapore show, Nate Diaz’s next main event, Randy Couture’s heart attack and more.

The rundown

Stream or download this and all episodes of MMA Junkie Radio over at AudioBoom, or check it out above. You can also catch it on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, and more. A new episode of the podcast is released every Monday and Thursday.
description: Hosts "Gorgeous" George and "Goze" break down the latest MMA news, including Nate Diaz, Bellator 231 and 232 recaps and UFC Singapore recap.
